page.title: 03ABBOTSWOOD NATURE TRAIL
page.content: THE NATURE TRAIL IS BUILT ON ABBOTSWOOD IT IS FAIRLY LARGE AND HAS SEVERAL ROUTES SOME OF WHICH ARE RATHER NARROW AND SOME ARE WIDE,MOST OF THEM ARE BORDERED BY WILD GARLIC AND TREES.BEFORE IT WAS BUILT ABBOTSWOOD HAD MORE WILDLIFE BUT PEOPLE WALKING PAST HAVE FRIGHTENED MANY OF THE BIRDS AND ANIMALS AWAY.THE ABBEY WALL RUNS THROUGH THE MIDDLE OF THE TRAIL,FURNESS ABBEY IS NEARBY.THERE HAVE BEEN SEVERAL BENCHES BUILT & TO REACH THE LOWER PARTS THERE ARE SOME STEPS.IN SPRING & EARLY SUMMER THERE ARE MANY WILD FLOWERS PARTICULARLY BLUEBELLS & RED CAMPION.THERE ARE SEVERAL MAPS SHOWING THE WAY ROUND.THERE IS A MAIN PATH & LOTS OF LITTLE OFFSHOOTS & YOU CAN PLAN YOUR WALK TO GO EVERYWHERE .THE FOREST TREES ARE,MAPLE,OAK,SYCAMORE & A FEW HORSE CHESTNUTS.
